_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:43:42 using v2.1
title: How long after contacting the surgery did patients actually see or speak to a GP or nurse?
analysis_commentary: After contacting the surgery, around half of patients said that they saw someone on the same or next working day (51% in 2011/12 and 49% in 2012/13). Early 2013/14 figures suggest that this hasn't changed significantly. However, in both years a sizeable percentage of patients also said that it took them more than a week to see someone (13% in 2011/12 and 15% in 2012/13).
